items.sentence: Tom certainly is good at making snap decisions.
Tom certainly seems to have learned his lesson.
Tom certainly spends a lot of money on jewelry.
Did you happen to see who was driving that car?
Did you have any idea that something was wrong?
That\'s a pretty big job to do all by yourself.
Tom gently kissed his daughter on the forehead.
We used to do that a lot when I was growing up.
Tom didn\'t like the answer that Mary gave him.
Tom didn\'t much like the way Mary treated him.
